page.title: 08Trade
page.content: After a long time the people of Capel got their Shopping Precinct. The Newsagents was also built around that time and sold sweets,papers,cigarettes etc.The Mace Shop started off as a bakery selling only flour and home baked bread.Then they began to sell biscuits and finally turned it into a General Store.The newsagents started off as a Newspaper Rack outside a house,gradually it has grown into what it is today. New Developments. Two Restaurants are now being built a "Happy Eater" and a "Little Chef". Many people in the village agree to this. They are both next to the busy A12.The "Little Chef" was started in May 1985.At first they had problems because the land was partly public property.They hope to finish it by September 1985.
